name: Beef Skewers With Garlic-Thyme Mojo
keywords: beef, cilantro leaves, extra virgin olive oil, oregano, sirloin steak, thyme, main course
recipeIngredient: 1 canned chipotle chile, pureed, or 1 dried chipotle chili, soaked in hot water, drained and minced
2 pounds boneless sirloin steak, 1 inch thick
Salt and freshly ground black pepper

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a heavy saucepan. Reserve 1 teaspoon garlic; add rest to oil, and cook, stirring, until golden. Add chipotle puree, 3/4 cup cilantro, soy sauce and honey. Simmer 3 minutes. Remove from heat, transfer to medium-large bowl and let cool.
Trim steak of all fat. Cut in strips 1/2 inch thick and 3 inches long. Add to bowl and mix to coat. Marinate 15 minutes.
Combine remaining garlic with oregano, thyme, stock and lime juice in small saucepan, and simmer 5 minutes. Add remaining cilantro. Season with salt and pepper. Remove from heat.
Weave steak strips onto skewers. Grill about 3 minutes on each side, to desired degree of doneness. Arrange on platter. Whisk butter into sauce, serve with steak.
